content: Multi-material jig saw blades Bimetal jig saw blades for cutting metal and plastic ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Cut more with the same blade – avoid interruptions to change the blade thanks to the extra-durable bimetal construction Our fastest cuts through metal – progressive, ground carbide teeth slice through stubborn metals faster than any other Hilti blade Applications Fast, rough cutting of steel, aluminum, nail-embedded wood and plastic For use with all jig saws with a T-shank blade clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Multiple materials, Steel, Non-ferrous metal, Wood, Wood with nails, Plastic Blade features: Universal Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Multiple materials, Steel, Non-ferrous metal, Wood, Wood with nails, Plastic | Blade features | Universal ### ITEMS- 2332311 - Jig saw blade SP 108 (5) univ - Package Size 5 pc
